name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Score App - Reverse image search as you shop.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stop wasting time reverse image searching. Score does it automatically as you shop, and 
 finds you the best deals from trusted sellers (Amazon, Walmart, Target, eBay, Temu).

As you shop online, Score will automatically recommend the best items to you. You can use Score by 1) visiting any popular retailer like Amazon, Walmart, or Target, and Score will automatically prompt if it finds a better deal, or 2) right clicking any image, or 3) use the screenshot feature in the toolbar.

On privacy: 1) Your data is never sold, 2) What we track is published on Github (see our homepage getscore.app), and 3) We only track when needed: to identify product trends.

If you have any feedback or suggestions, please email us at hello@getscore.app. And if you love Score, don't forget to rate us 5 stars.

--
